name: Participatory Value Definition
description: Systems and processes enabling communities to collaboratively define and specify values, principles, and objectives that AI systems should align with and promote, ensuring AI alignment represents diverse perspectives and democratic input.

capabilities.name: Multi-stakeholder Elicitation
capabilities.description: Methods for identifying and engaging diverse stakeholders in the AI value definition process

functions.name: Democratic Legitimacy
functions.description: Methods for ensuring legitimacy of AI value definition processes through democratic participation and oversight

specifications.name: Democratic Oversight Framework
specifications.description: Technical specifications for frameworks that enable democratic oversight of AI value definition processes
requirements: Transparent decision-making processes that are accessible to all stakeholders
Mechanisms for stakeholder feedback and contestation of decisions
Accountability structures that ensure oversight bodies are answerable to the public
Documentation of all oversight activities and decisions

integration.name: Democratic Oversight Implementation
integration.description: Integration approach for implementing democratic oversight frameworks in AI value definition processes

techniques.name: Inclusive Governance Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for establishing inclusive governance structures for democratic oversight

applications.name: Democratic Oversight Platform
applications.description: Digital platform enabling transparent oversight of AI value definition processes by diverse stakeholders

inputs.name: Value Definition Processes
inputs.description: Ongoing and planned processes for defining AI values
inputs.constraints: Must include clear descriptions of methodologies and participation mechanisms

inputs.name: Stakeholder Feedback
inputs.description: Feedback from diverse stakeholders on value definition processes
inputs.constraints: Must include representation from historically marginalized communities

outputs.name: Oversight Reports
outputs.description: Regular reports on the democratic legitimacy of value definition processes
outputs.interpretation: Provides transparency and accountability for oversight activities

outputs.name: Improvement Recommendations
outputs.description: Recommendations for enhancing democratic legitimacy of processes
outputs.interpretation: Enables iterative improvement of democratic oversight mechanisms

specifications.name: Legitimacy Verification Mechanisms
specifications.description: Technical specifications for mechanisms to verify and ensure the democratic legitimacy of AI value definition outcomes
requirements: Methods for assessing representativeness of stakeholder participation
Mechanisms for verifying that final values reflect stakeholder input
Procedures for validating the democratic nature of decision-making processes
Tools for analyzing power dynamics in value definition processes

integration.description: Integration approach for implementing mechanisms to verify the democratic legitimacy of AI value definition outcomes

techniques.name: Participation Analysis Technique
techniques.description: Techniques for analyzing and verifying the representativeness and quality of stakeholder participation

applications.name: Legitimacy Assessment System
applications.description: System for assessing and reporting on the democratic legitimacy of AI value definition processes

inputs.name: Participation Data
inputs.description: Data on stakeholder participation in value definition processes
inputs.constraints: Must include demographic information and participation rates

inputs.name: Process Documentation
inputs.description: Documentation of decision-making processes used in value definition
inputs.constraints: Must include detailed information on how decisions were made

outputs.name: Legitimacy Report
outputs.description: Report assessing the democratic legitimacy of value definition processes
outputs.interpretation: Provides transparent evaluation of democratic quality

outputs.name: Improvement Recommendations
outputs.description: Recommendations for enhancing democratic legitimacy
outputs.interpretation: Enables iterative improvement of democratic processes
